001package org.opt4j.optimizers.ea.aeseh;
002
003import static org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Citation.PublicationMonth.UNKNOWN;
004
005import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Citation;
006import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Info;
007import org.opt4j.core.config.annotations.Name;
008import org.opt4j.core.start.Constant;
009import org.opt4j.optimizers.ea.Selector;
010import org.opt4j.optimizers.ea.SelectorModule;
011
012/**
013 * Binds the {@link EpsilonSamplingSelector} as {@link Selector}.
014 * 
015 * 
016 * @author Fedor Smirnov
017 *
018 */
019@Name("Epsilon Sampling")
020@Citation(authors = "Hernán Aguirre, Akira Oyama, and Kiyoshi Tanaka", title = "Adaptive ε-sampling and ε-hood for evolutionary many-objective optimization.", journal = "Evolutionary Multi-Criterion Optimization (EMO)", pageFirst = 322, pageLast = 336, year = 2013, month = UNKNOWN)
021public class EpsilonSamplingSelectorModule extends SelectorModule {
022
023        @Info("The start value used for the epsilon value which is applied during the survivor selection.")
024        @Constant(value = "epsilonSample", namespace = ESamplingSurvivorGeneration.class)
025        protected double epsilonSample = 0.0;
026        @Info("The start value used for the adaption of the epsilon value which is applied during the survivor selection.")
027        @Constant(value = "epsilonSampleDelta", namespace = ESamplingSurvivorGeneration.class)
028        protected double epsilonSampleDelta = 0.005;
029        @Info("The maximal value used for the epsilon value which is applied during the survivor selection.")
030        @Constant(value = "epsilonSampleDeltaMax", namespace = ESamplingSurvivorGeneration.class)
031        protected double epsilonSampleDeltaMax = 0.005;
032        @Info("The minimal value used for the epsilon value which is applied during the survivor selection.")
033        @Constant(value = "epsilonSampleDeltaMin", namespace = ESamplingSurvivorGeneration.class)
034        protected double epsilonSampleDeltaMin = 0.0001;
035
036        @Override
037        protected void config() {
038                bindSelector(EpsilonSamplingSelector.class);
039        }
040
041        public double getEpsilonSample() {
042                return epsilonSample;
043        }
044
045        public void setEpsilonSample(double epsilonSample) {
046                this.epsilonSample = epsilonSample;
047        }
048
049        public double getEpsilonSampleDelta() {
050                return epsilonSampleDelta;
051        }
052
053        public void setEpsilonSampleDelta(double epsilonSampleDelta) {
054                this.epsilonSampleDelta = epsilonSampleDelta;
055        }
056
057        public double getEpsilonSampleDeltaMax() {
058                return epsilonSampleDeltaMax;
059        }
060
061        public void setEpsilonSampleDeltaMax(double epsilonSampleDeltaMax) {
062                this.epsilonSampleDeltaMax = epsilonSampleDeltaMax;
063        }
064
065        public double getEpsilonSampleDeltaMin() {
066                return epsilonSampleDeltaMin;
067        }
068
069        public void setEpsilonSampleDeltaMin(double epsilonSampleDeltaMin) {
070                this.epsilonSampleDeltaMin = epsilonSampleDeltaMin;
071        }
072
073}
